IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PRIVATE, UNDERGRADUATE AND GRADUATE HIGHER EDUCATION
IRS990.MissionDesc: OUACHITA BAPTIST UNIVERSITY IS A CHRIST-CENTERED LEARNING COMMUNITY. EMBRACING THE LIBERAL ARTS TRADITION, THE UNIVERSITY PREPARES INDIVIDUALS FOR ONGOING INTELLECTUAL AND SPIRITUAL GROWTH, LIVES OF MEANINGFUL WORK, AND REASONED ENGAGEMENT WITH THE WORLD.
IRS990.Desc: INSTITUTION OF PRIVATE CHRISTIAN HIGHER EDUCATION AFFILIATED WITH THE ARKANSAS BAPTIST STATE CONVENTION OFFERING RESIDENTIAL UNDERGRADUATE, ONLINE UNDERGRADUATE, AND GRADUATE DEGREES IN VARIOUS DISCIPLINES TO APPROXIMATELY 1,800 STUDENTS FROM APPROXIMATELY 25 STATES AND 23 COUNTRIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COLLECTIONS ARE MADE UP OF ITEMS OF HISTORICAL SIGNIFICANCE AND ART OBJECTS THAT ARE HELD FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES. EACH OF THE ITEMS IS PRESERVED AND CARED FOR, AND ACTIVITIES VERIFYING THEIR EXISTENCE AND ASSESSING THEIR CONDITION ARE PERFORMED PERIODICALLY. THE COLLECTIONS, WHICH WERE ACQUIRED THROUGH CONTRIBUTIONS SINCE THE ORGANIZATION'S INCEPTION, ARE NOT RECOGNIZED AS ASSETS IN THE STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION.
FORESIGHT AND FAITHFULNESS FOUNDATION GRANT - ELIMINATION AUDIT ENTRY 5,794,200.
OUACHITA'S RACIALLY NON-DISCRIMINATORY POLICY HAS BEEN PUBLICIZED BY NOTICE IN LOCAL COMMUNITY NEWSPAPERS, THROUGH THE ANNUAL CATALOG PROVIDED TO STUDENTS, AND THROUGH THE STUDENT HANDBOOK.
THE UNIVERSITY RECEIVED FUNDING FOR STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS (TITLE IV), TRIO PROGRAMS, AND FOSTER GRANDPARENT'S PROGRAM.

ISSUER NAME: CITY OF ARKADELPHIA, AR DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 03/01/2022 ISSUER NAME: CITY OF ARKADELPHIA, AR DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 03/01/2022 ISSUER NAME: CITY OF ARKADELPHIA, AR DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 03/01/2022 ISSUER NAME: CITY OF ARKADELPHIA, AR DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 03/01/2022

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE AUDIT COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, THEN MADE AVAILABLE TO ALL TRUSTEES PRIOR TO ITS FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TRUSTEES, FACULTY, AND STAFF MUST COMPLETE OR UPDATE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE FORM EACH YEAR. A MANAGEMENT PLAN IS CREATED AND MONITORED FOR ANY IDENTIFIED POTENTIAL CONFLICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION REVIEW PROCESS MUST BE CONDUCTED NO LESS THAN EVERY 24 MONTHS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS POSTED ON THE UNIVERSITY'S WEBSITE. AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FORM 990 ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
